alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 11:37PM MDT until May 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Hutchinson, Yankton and Bon Homme Counties. James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Scotland. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, approximately 4400 acres of farm land are flooded between Mitchell and Yankton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:30 AM CDT Sunday was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 12.8 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed James River Scotland 13.0 14.5 Sun 12 am 14.1 13.7 13.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 245 AM CDT.
